Description: I am offering an Ibanez SJ300-DVS Dark Violin Sunburst Hollow Body Electric Guitar with solid Spruce top, flame Maple back and sides, 5-pc. Maple/Walnut Neck, Ebony Fretboard, Two Super 58 custom pickups. Rosewood ART-W bridge and graceful VT06S tailpiece. Controls: 2 x Volume, 2 x Tone, 3-way Pickup Toggle This guitar is in perfect, flawless condition; NO scratches; never left my house; You will find it difficult if not impossible to identify the difference between a new copy right out of the factory and this guitar (except the price!). It is beautiful to look at and every detail screams quality and refinement; versatile as a jazz instrument or for blues, pop. The influences of these legendary instruments are immediately apparent with bone nut, ebony fretboard and Ibanez's signature Super 58 custom pickups. The critical eye will appreciate the details like the smoothness of the fretboard and a skilled crimping technique generally found on instruments costing thousands more. George Benson and Pat Metheny play signature Ibanez models $975 includes a like-new Ibanez SJ300-DVS Dark Violin Sunburst Electric Hollow Body Guitar with flawless Ibanez hard case (lock and 2 keys), Instruction Manual, extra gold-plated bridge, neck truss rod tool, extra set of D'Addario (EJ10) 80/20 Bronze Extra Light Gauge Strings PLUS: FREE SHIPPING TO CONTINENTAL U.S. AND FREE INSURANCE It is a steal compared to popular brands of like quality costing thousands more. Compare online and find there are a few available for sale for $300 to $500+ more.
